name: BeckerCentralControl
0:
”Alexa, switch on watch football”
”Alexa, activate night mode”
”Alexa, turn on leaving home”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A voice based control for Becker Antriebe CentralControl home automation systems. Enables the triggering of created scenarios on your devices. To evade voice recognition problems please name your scenarios adequately.

Requires a Becker home automation system and a free subscription to the Becker gateway server at https://gw.b-tronic.net/

Set up your Becker home automation system and create scenarios according to your needs. After generating a sign-up code on your home automation system, please register at https://gw.b-tronic.net/. Log in to this skill with the credentials you provided and start the discovery process. You will be given a complete list of scenarios you created.
